dailyFunStuff.title: Veterans stepped out onto their driveways on ANZAC day to honour their fellow soldiers
dailyFunStuff.content:
Many of these veterans have been living in isolation for weeks as they are part of the groups considered most at-risk for from COVID-19. Pictured above is Sergeant Steve Toon, formerly of the British Infantry and Australian Infantry Reserves.

Read more about veterans like Sergeant Steve and what they have done for their country in the article below!

citation.name: Coronavirus crisis: West Australian veterans step onto driveways to honour mates in Anzac day first - The West Australian
